title: Recall the purpose of LaTeX
text: Discarding how foreign the usage may feel, LaTeXs purpose is not to solve equations, but to render them.

title: Be critical
text: Would there be a use case to render a random mathematical equation with a command?

title: Rendering special characters
text: LaTeX will not render special characters unless told to. Changing the mode of a text does not tell LaTeX to do so.
